DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective estimate time progressive disease patient receive LY573636 two previous treatment metastatic non-small cell lung cancer . Patients receive intravenous infusion study drug every 21 day . CT-scans do first dose every treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study LY573636 Patients With Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis metastatic nonsmallcell lung cancer At least 18 year age Have receive 2 previous treatment regimen metastatic nonsmallcell lung cancer Serious preexist medical condition Previous cancer ( except skin cancer , exclude melanoma ) Have receive 3 previous treatment regimen metastatic non smallcell lung cancer Active treatment Coumadin
